channel.title: Help Thread!
channel.description:
Rule 1: Before you ask your question, you must check the FAQ's which are stated below BEFORE you post your question. Rule 2: Search the tutorial section for a tutorial before asking for help on how to do something. Rule 3: There is NO FLAMING at all toward the person asking the question. Rule 4: No posting multiple topics about the same question. Stick to one topic to get the full answer to your question. Rule 5: There is no spamming allowed on this forum. If you are caught spamming, your post will be edited and if you continue it may result in a ban. Rule 6: There is no advertising allowed in this forum. If you are caught, you will get your post edited and may result also in a ban. Rule 7: Stay on topic. If you start posting stuff that would belong in other forums, we will move the topic to where it belongs. If you continue to, you may get a day ban or two.
You must abide by these rules also dont get mad if i dont answer right away but i will give an answer ;)
